verses.text: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w*.

Blessed \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w holdeth|strong="H2388"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w fast|strong="H2388"\w*; \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w profaning|strong="H2490"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

Neither let \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1121"\w*, \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w joined|strong="H3867"\w* \w himself|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, speak, saying, \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H1121"\w* separate \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; neither let \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w eunuch|strong="H5631"\w* say, \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dry|strong="H3002"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* choose \w the|strong="H3588"\w* things \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w please|strong="H2654"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* \w fast|strong="H2388"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*:

\w Unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w within|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w memorial|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*; \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

\w Also|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w foreigners|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w join|strong="H3867"\w* \w themselves|strong="H2388"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* love \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w everyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w profaning|strong="H2490"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w holdeth|strong="H2388"\w* \w fast|strong="H2388"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*;

\w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w bring|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w make|strong="H8055"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w joyful|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*: \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w accepted|strong="H7522"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* mine \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w gathereth|strong="H6908"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w outcasts|strong="H1760"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w*, \w Yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \add others\add* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w besides|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* own \w that|strong="H3478"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w*.

\w All|strong="H3605"\w* ye \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, come \w to|strong="H7704"\w* devour, \add yea\add*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* ye \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w in|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*.

\w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w watchmen|strong="H6822"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* dumb \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w bark|strong="H5024"\w*; dreaming, \w lying|strong="H7901"\w* \w down|strong="H7901"\w*, loving \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w slumber|strong="H5123"\w*.

Yea, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w greedy|strong="H5315"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w can|strong="H3045"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w enough|strong="H7654"\w*; \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w understand|strong="H3045"\w*: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w gain|strong="H1215"\w*, \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w quarter|strong="H7097"\w*.

\w Come|strong="H1961"\w* \w ye|strong="H3117"\w*, \add say they\add*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w fetch|strong="H3947"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w fill|strong="H5433"\w* ourselves \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w strong|strong="H7941"\w* \w drink|strong="H7941"\w*; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add a day\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* beyond \w measure|strong="H3966"\w*.
